items.name: Object_Container
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Object_Container
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Object_Container extends gs.Object_Base
    ###*
    * A game object which can contain other game objects.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Object_Container
    * @extends gs.Object_Base
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: (disposeBehavior) ->
        super
    
        ###*
        * Indiciates if the container and its sub objects are visible on screen.
        * @property visible
        * @type boolean
        ###
        @visible = yes
        
        ###*
        * The container's behavior component.
        * @property behavior
        * @type behavior
        ###
        @behavior = new gs.Component_Container(disposeBehavior)
        @addComponent(@behavior)
        
gs.Object_Container = Object_Container
